name: InvasiveHaemophilusInfluenzaeDiseaseTestsForHaemophilusInfluenzaeByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Invasive Haemophilus influenzae Disease (Tests for Haemophilus influenzae by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Haemophilus influenzae),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Haemophilus influenzae culture/isolate;  

LOINC search: 'Haemophilus influenzae (culture or isolate)'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)

concept.display: Haemophilus influenzae serotype [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
Haemophilus influenzae [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
Haemophilus influenzae DNA [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture

contains.display: Haemophilus influenzae serotype [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
Haemophilus influenzae [Identifier] in Specimen by Organism specific culture
Haemophilus influenzae DNA [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture
